txt.en: The wedding planner can be found on the Seventh Tier of Minas Tirith.\n\nYou should let the wedding planner know you have placed the arrangements.
The wedding planner in Minas Tirith needs help decorating the city for her events.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
'Have you placed all of the decorations? Well what are you waiting for then?!'

'If you're planning to visit the Houses of Lore this day, I would appreciate some assistance. Here, take these arrangements and find good locations to liven the place up a bit. Especially that room with all of the dead things. Why on Middle-earth anyone would want to be married in the same room as a troll is beyond my understanding.'
The Houses of Lore are located on the Fifth Tier of Minas Tirith.\n\nYou should decorate the Houses of Lore with the floral arrangements.
'Ah, you have returned flower-free. Lovely. I shall send my assistant around to check your work. Come back again later. I may have some other tasks for you.'
